title: 3D SuperTuxKart
description:
SuperTuxKart is a 3d kart racing game; we want to make the game fun more than we want to make it realistic.

 You can play with up to 4 friends on one PC racing against each other, or just try to beat the computer.

See the great lighthouse or drive through the sand and visit the pyramids.

 Race under water or in space, watching the stars passing by.Have some rest under the palms on the beach (watching the other karts overtaking you).

 But don&#039;t fall in the volcano. You can do a single race against other karts, compete in one of several Grand Prix, or try to beat the high score in time trials on your own.

Challenges will allow you to unlock additional tracks and racing modes.
